[ti:Something Just Like This]

[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Something Just Like This - We Rabbitz/Adam Christopher
[00:08.62]Written by：Andrew Taggart/Guy Berryman/Jonny Buckland/Chris Martin/Will Champion
[00:17.24]I've been reading books of old
[00:18.82]
[00:19.47]The legends and the myths
[00:21.84]Achilles and his gold
[00:23.59]
[00:24.16]Hercules and his gifts
[00:25.90]
[00:26.82]Spiderman's control
[00:28.17]
[00:28.78]And batman with his fists
[00:30.90]
[00:31.66]But clearly I don't see myself upon that list
[00:35.47]She said where'd you wanna go
[00:37.62]
[00:38.18]How much you wanna risk
[00:40.27]I'm not looking for somebody
[00:42.51]With some superhuman gifts
[00:45.18]Some superhero
[00:46.55]
[00:47.40]Some fairytale bliss
[00:49.83]Just something I can turn to
[00:52.06]Somebody I can kiss
[00:54.08]I want something just like this
[00:56.76]Doo doo doo doo doo doo
[00:58.07]
